policySentences: In certain cases, we may also share some Personal Information with third parties, but only as described below.||However, we may share your Personal Information with third parties as described in this section: Aggregated Personal Information that's no longer personally identifiable.

We will only share your personal information with other companies or individuals outside of Google in the following circumstances: as permitted under the Google Privacy Policy||We will only share your personal information with other companies or individuals outside of Google in the following circumstances: as permitted by law||We will only share your personal information with other companies or individuals outside of Google in the following circumstances: as necessary to process your transaction and maintain your account, including to provide security improvements, protect your account against fraud, and for other everyday business purposes||We will only share your personal information with other companies or individuals outside of Google in the following circumstances: to complete your requested registration for a service provided by a third party||We will only share your personal information with other companies or individuals outside of Google in the following circumstances: to inform a third-party merchant, whose site or app you visit, whether you have a Google payments profile that can be used to make payments through that merchant's site or app.||We will only share your personal information with other companies or individuals outside of Google in the following circumstances: to share fraud risk scores and other fraud assessments with third parties that use Google's risk score and fraud prevention services, in order to protect your transactions with third parties from fraud and abuse||We will only share your personal information with other companies or individuals outside of Google in the following circumstances: to help ensure your payment method is secure and valid, and to provide you with relevant information about your payment method's features and benefits, we may share your personal information with your payment method issuer, payment network, processors, and their affiliates
